name: Hilton Garden Inn Calgary Airport

reviews.text: We have been staying at the Hilton Garden Inn for many years. The hotel is very clean with good facilities. The staff are very helpful. Excellent shuttle service, driver always has cookies for his passengers!! All in all a very nice place to stay.
reviews.title: A good place to stay, near the Calgary airport

reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel several times over the last few years. The staff is fabulous and does everything they can to make your stay a pleasant one. Rooms are clean and comfortable. The restaurant has the absolutely best breakfast anywhere. This visit was a business meeting. The meeting room met all our requirements, the catered meals were excellent and the staff went above and beyond to meet our needs. Free coffee is available all day and the cookies in the afternoon are really good.
reviews.title: Delightful Hotel

reviews.text: Nice hotel, close to the airport, McDonald's across the street and other shopping...even though I was there when it was freezing, it was easy to get to places and the stay was comfortable! Great view from the room, and nice amenities!
reviews.title: Calgary Garden Inn
Perfect for hockey teams
reviews.text: The hospitality suite is perfect. Team had breakfast together each morning. Parents gathered at night to visit. Best experience yet for a kids sports trip. Highly recommend Hilton for team travelling. Same experience in Fargo, ND, USA this winter. Hilton knows its customers very well.

I have stayed at this hotel a couple of times and have never been disappointed. This last trip was no exception. The staff were courteous and very helpful. I had some medical issues, which caused me a lot of pain. The staff bent over backwards to make sure I was comfortable. The hotel itself, is always spotless and the décor is current and eye pleasing.
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.text: This hotel has everything you need at a great price and the shuttle between hotel and airport is an additional bonus! Stayed at this hotel many many times and will continue to do so. The restaurant is clean and the food is really good. The pool is clean and is never really busy, so it is nice and relaxing. All staff members are welcoming and accomodating.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Beds were too hard even after you "adjusted" them. The temperature of the room was too warm and the air conditioning did not cool the room down even after being on for over 24 hours. Overall, dissappointed with Hilton as I expected more from such a recognized hotel chain.
reviews.title: Beds are too hard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this location for two nights. The room was very spacious and quiet. Everything was clean and in working order. Easy to get to and close to a large shopping mall. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Great Location and Service

reviews.text: Just another hotel in close proximity to the airport? Not so. I am impressed every time by the friendliness and helpfulness of the front desk staff....in person and on the phone pre-visit. More than satisfactory building with the usual amenities. Great coffee bar (gratis) and cafe in the lobby.
reviews.title: Canadian Customer Service i.e. Excellent

reviews.text: Accept AAA and gov discounts.
reviews.title: a very nice airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stay here on business and my wife and I stayed here on the heels of a three day stay each at Chateau Lake Louise and Jasper Park Lodge. Those places were both disappointing, which only caused me to appreciate this place even more. Rooms are very clean. We hadn't had a good night's sleep the previous week due to the lack of substantive pillows at CLL and JPL, so I requested an additional four foam pillows, which was over the top but were brought without delay. My wife and I slept like babys. The staff is quite good and friendly. This is my home in Calgary.
reviews.title: Always good

reviews.text: Stayed here in May of 2012 with my son's spring hockey team. Lisa and staff were extremely helpful in setting up packages for the zoo for each family! Even for the ones not staying at the hotel! Emailed hotel on short notice for a business stay in June of 2013 and was accomodated immediately with no issues. Even when the oil show was on! Will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Only place to stay in Calgary!!

reviews.text: We usually stay at pricer hotels close to the airport but we found a good deal at the Hilton Garden Inn and decided to book this hotel.
reviews.title: Hidden gem ... great hotel with airport shuttle
Great place to stay
reviews.text: From the moment we walked in we were surprised with how beautiful this hotel was, the front desk staff were professional and very friendly, the room was very clean, quiet and beds were comfy. We took a shuttle to the airport around 4:30 am and two weeks later came back at noon. Each time the driver was friendly and quick ... this is now our new favourite hotel to use when travelling and we will be back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Love that you can park your car and enjoy such excellent service at a decent price.
reviews.title: Thumbs Up

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights after a long drive from Fort Nelson. My hubby was down for a job interview and I took advantage of all the great amenities for a day in the meantime. Business center was nicely equipped for all your printing/faxing needs. Fitness centre had a good amount of machines, towels and cool water. LOVE the newly renovated lobby, very chic and modern look for this great hotel. The front desk staff always made sure to greet us upon arrival and departure of the hotel, which was a nice touch. Our guest room was appointed to us the 2nd floor. Slept in the king bed, which I personally found was quite stiff (not used to the hard type of mattresses). We had breakfast and dinner on one occasion in the restaurant, food was fab and our server was super. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling through Calgary and we will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Returning Customer

reviews.text: Great hotel, good price and very close to airport. Beds were very comfortable and rooms were clean and quiet. Business centre was well equipped and accessible. Bar and restaurant service and food were very good. Coffee and hot chocolate available at the front desk. All over a very good experience.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have mixed feelings about our stay at the HGI. The staff are friendly and jacuzzi suite was large and comfortable. The jacuzzi can only be activated by turning a knob on a far wall in the bathroom every half hour so that was annoying. Breakfast is a bit confusing. Some parts you're supposed to order from your server, some parts you get yourself from a buffet. I heard the server murmur, " that was fun", after we made an error in which part was which. He also insulted the omelet cooks who did not speak English very well. I didn't find it funny.
reviews.title: So-so

reviews.text: If you can get a good deal, this hotel is generally ok, but I wouldn't stay for days and days.
reviews.title: Living Inside An Episode Of Full House?

reviews.text: My fiancée and I booked a room here for 1 night because it's close to the airport, as we headed out to banff for the long weekend. The service was okay, the staff weren't exactly genuinely appreciative for our business as most good hotels are. The decor was absolutely terrible, and I have no idea how this hotel receieved such a high rating. I felt like I was trapped in a bad 80's tv show (full house?). I'm not sure how old this building is but both the interior and exterior need some serious remodeling. I don't recommend anyone stay here unless you're bringing your grandma.
reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable with excellent breakfast

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Calgary Airport Hotel Calgary
